title: ICurve.ILineParams
description: Gets the parameters of a curve that is a line.
returns: Pointer to an array of doubles (see Remarks )
remarks:
The return value is an array of 6 double values:
[
rootPoint.x, rootPoint.y, rootPoint.z, direction.x, direction.y, direction.z
]
SOLIDWORKS stores
rootPoint
in meters.
